title: Mi ultimo round (2011) GTM - Multi Subs
description:
Mi ultimo round (2011)


My Last Round is a powerful drama about a struggling small-town Chilean boxer, Octavio (working as a hairdresser during the day to make ends meet), who falls in love with Hugo, a troubled young man searching for his true self. The couple moves to capital city Santiago with energized dreams of building a life together and protecting their love from a harsh world, in a story that recalls Rocky and Brokeback Mountain in equal measures.
